yaml_deprecation.title: YAML configuration is deprecated
yaml_deprecation.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future version.

To continue using this integration, please:
1. Remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml file
2. Restart Home Assistant
3. Go to Settings > Devices & Services
4. Click 'Add Integration' and find {integration_title}
5. Follow the setup wizard to configure the integration.
